page.title: 19ENTERTAINMENTS
page.content: A very popular activity amongst the young people of the village is the {TRULL SCOUT AND CUB pack.}This is a very well supported and well run organisation and the pack is one of the biggest in the area .It has its own distinctive Tee shirt with the Pack emblem stamped on it and the pack do very well in the competitions with other packs such as the Swimming Sports or the Sports Day competition.The cubs and scouts have their own permanent campsite at{Huish {Woods},an excellent District camp site where all the packs enjoy a small enclosed area of the wood. {Church parades}in Taunton are also always well supported and an occasion for a show of strength.A very elaborate{magazine}keeps parents and friends well informed of all the activities.
